price: Say [O Prophet], “I am only a warner, and none has the right to be worshiped except Allah, the One, the Subjugator,
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
